DOC.brief_title: Astigmatism Management Cataract Surgery With AcrySof Toric Intraocular Lens
DOC.detailed_description: A recent innovation cataract surgery consist introduction toric intraocular lens ( IOLs ) correct corneal astigmatism . It offer opportunity patient substantial astigmatism achieve optimal distance vision without use spectacle . Good near vision may subsequently achieve low-cost reading glass . The current practice non-toric IOL implantation astigmatic patient warrant use expensive bifocal multifocal spectacle cylinder correction achieve good distance near vision . Objective : The primary objective study compare spectacle independence distance vision follow toric IOL implantation monofocal intraocular lens ( IOL ) implantation . The secondary objective compare uncorrected distance vision , residual refractive astigmatism , quality vision , wavefront aberration , contrast sensitivity , complication profile , cost postoperative spectacle cost-effectiveness . Study design : Multi-centre randomised clinical trial . Study population : 160 patient regular corneal astigmatism least 1.25 diopter eye require bilateral cataract surgery . Intervention : Cataract surgery implantation toric IOL ( AcrySof model SN60TT ) monofocal IOL ( AcrySof model SN60AT ) .
